Constructor.

Parameters:
theIssuanceElements - Values generated during a protocol step that need to be communicated to the communication partner.
theProof - Relevant values of the proof convincing the communication partner to continue the protocol.
theUpdateLocation - [optional] If the credential is updateable, the location where updates can be fetched needs to be sent to the RECIPIENT.
